tool_description: Amazon AWS Translate lets you localize content for diverse global users and translate and analyze large volumes of text to activate cross-lingual communication between users.
name: Amazon AWS Translate API
title: Amazon AWS Translate API

api_list.name: Get Languages
api_list.description: Get all available languages for translations.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://amazon-aws-translate-api.p.rapidapi.com/get-languages"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "amazon-aws-translate-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://amazon-aws-translate-api.p.rapidapi.com/get-languages"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "amazon-aws-translate-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
